subject: Bankruptcies
Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The team has apparently concluded a new exclusive negotiating agreement with David Einhorn, but it is said to have spoken again with a rejected bidder, Ray Bartoszek.
snippet: The team has apparently concluded a new exclusive negotiating agreement with David Einhorn, but it is said to have spoken again with a rejected bidder, Ray Bartoszek.
